StatDef.label: medical potency
StatDef.description: How effective this is when used to tend wounds and diseases, or do surgery. Higher medical potency improves the quality of tending, and acts as a multiplier on the chance of success during surgery. Medical potency is just one factor in medical outcomes, among many others, including doctor ability, equipment, cleanliness, and luck.

StatDef.label: medical tend quality maximum
StatDef.description: The maximum quality of medical tending that can be achieved while using this. Better tend quality allows skilled doctors to treat wounds better, as well as more reliably.

StatDef.label: construction speed
StatDef.description: The speed at which buildings made of this are constructed is multiplied by this value. Some materials, like stone, are slow to build from, while others, like wood, are fast.
